title: Quality control department at PT. Preshion Engineering Plastec
abstract: PT. Preshion Engineering Plastec provides plastic injection molding to multi-national customer with job order system. On the job training was conducted in Quality Control Department, from operator level to supervisor level, for six months.
contributors: SUPRIYANTO (Advisor 1); Indriati Njoto Bisono (Advisor 2); Herri Christian Palit (Examination Committee 1)
